```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    df_head = df.head()
    df_describe = df.describe()
    return[df_head, df_describe]

preview_data(data)
```
